name: SendTestEmailCampaign
description:
Send a test email for a specific campaign.

Use this tool to send a test email for a specified Mailchimp marketing campaign. Useful for previewing the campaign before final send.

parameters.name: campaign_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the specific Mailchimp campaign to send the test email for.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: test_email_addresses
parameters.description: An array of email addresses to receive the test email.

value_schema.description: An array of email addresses to send the test email to.

parameters.name: test_email_send_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of test email to send: 'html' or 'plaintext'.

value_schema.description: Choose the type of test email to send.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: test_emails
parameters.description: An array of email addresses to send the test email to.

value_schema.description: An array of email addresses to send the test email to.

parameters.name: send_type
parameters.description: Choose the type of test email to send.

value_schema.description: Choose the type of test email to send.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
